sentences.cn: “这是场彻底的失败，”他怒吼道。

sentences.en: But why had he had a total fiasco at last?
sentences.cn: 那为何最后他会如此惨败?

sentences.en: His last visit to Washington was little short of a fiasco.
sentences.cn: 他最近对华盛顿的访问几乎是一场惨败。

sentences.en: It was a bit of a fiasco.
The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

sentences.en: The Chrysler fiasco had occurred after thirty years of postwar, scientific management.
sentences.cn: 克莱斯勒公司的大灾难发生在经过战后三十年科学管理的今天.

sentences.en: The company was still reeling from the Edsel fiasco a couple of years back.
sentences.cn: 鉴于几年前,在埃德·塞尔事件中惨败,公司仍处在余震之中.

sentences.en: The enemy's plot ended in a fiasco.
sentences.cn: 敌人的阴谋以可耻的失败告终.

sentences.en: The first lecture I ever gave was a complete fiasco .
sentences.cn: 我第一次讲课糟得一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: The meeting was a fiasco from start to finish.
sentences.cn: 会议自始至终都失败了.

sentences.en: The new play was a fiasco.
The resort to air charters turned out to be a fiasco.
sentences.cn: 采用包租飞机的办法完全失败.

sentences.en: These Clausewtzian commonplaces will shed light on the grotesque fiasco at Leyte Gulf.
sentences.cn: 克劳塞维茨这几句平易浅显的话,可以说明莱特湾那一次近似荒唐的失败原因.

sentences.en: This 1997 - 2000 fiasco should have served as a canary - in - the - coal - mine warning for the far - larger conventional housing market.
sentences.cn: 1997年至2000年, fiasco 如同煤矿中的金丝雀被用来作为大型的传统住宅市场的预警.

sentences.en: This fiasco confirmed Kennedy's impression of Phoumi's singular incompetence.
sentences.cn: 这次惨败更加坚定了肯尼迪认为富米毫无能力的看法.

sentences.en: Who do we have to thank for this fiasco?

trans.tran_en: an event that is completely unsuccessful, in a way that is very embarrassing or disappointing
